name: Heart and Soul: Who will you choose
name_original: Heart and Soul: Who will you choose
description:
THIS IS ONLY A TEST BUILD. MORE EXCITING UPDATES WILL COME IN THE FUTURE.

Warning! Heart and Soul contains the fowllowing, gore, depression, sucidal thoughts, murder, bullying and a horrific story. If you don't feel comfortable with these subject matter, please play...

If you like these subjects, feel free to enjoy the plot twisting, story rich and option variety with different endings to each options. 

Enjoy!

If you feel inconfortable please do not play.
